title: Large-Scale Information Literacy Enhancement Program Utilizing Federated Search Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and possession of specialized knowledge in mathematics
context.additional_context: Cultivation of information analysis and problem-solving skills using federated search tools in smartphone-based VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently search for specialized materials in mathematics using federated search systems
Learners can critically evaluate search results and identify reliable information sources
Learners can solve research problems according to information literacy standard frameworks in VR simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
